org.apache.calcite.prepare

接口 Prepare.CatalogReader

  • 所有超级接口:
    RelOptSchema, SqlOperatorTable, SqlValidatorCatalogReader, Wrapper
    所有已知实现类:
    CalciteCatalogReader
    封闭类:
    Prepare

    public static interface Prepare.CatalogReader
extends RelOptSchema, SqlValidatorCatalogReader, SqlOperatorTable
    Interface by which validator and planner can read table metadata.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static ThreadLocal<Prepare.CatalogReader> THREAD_LOCAL 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      Finds a table or schema with the given name, possibly qualified.
      Prepare.PreparingTable getTableForMember(List<String> names)
      Retrieves a RelOptTable based upon a member access.
      Prepare.CatalogReader withSchemaPath(List<String> schemaPath)
      Returns a catalog reader the same as this one but with a possibly different schema path.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.calcite.plan.RelOptSchema

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.calcite.sql.validate.SqlValidatorCatalogReader

        createTypeFromProjection, field, getAllSchemaObjectNames, getConfig, getNamedType, getRootSchema, getSchemaPaths, isCaseSensitive, matches, nameMatcher

    • 方法详细资料

      • getTableForMember

        Prepare.PreparingTable getTableForMember(List<String> names)
        从接口复制的说明: RelOptSchema
        Retrieves a RelOptTable based upon a member access.

        For example, the Saffron expression salesSchema.emps would be resolved using a call to salesSchema.getTableForMember(new String[]{"emps" }).

        Note that name.length is only greater than 1 for queries originating from JDBC.

        指定者:
        getTableForMember 在接口中 RelOptSchema
        参数:
        names - Qualified name

      • withSchemaPath

        Prepare.CatalogReader withSchemaPath(List<String> schemaPath)
        Returns a catalog reader the same as this one but with a possibly different schema path.

      • getTable

        Prepare.PreparingTable getTable(List<String> names)
        从接口复制的说明: SqlValidatorCatalogReader
        Finds a table or schema with the given name, possibly qualified.

        Uses the case-sensitivity policy of the catalog reader.

        If not found, returns null. If you want a more descriptive error message or to override the case-sensitivity of the match, use SqlValidatorScope.resolveTable(java.util.List<java.lang.String>, org.apache.calcite.sql.validate.SqlNameMatcher, org.apache.calcite.sql.validate.SqlValidatorScope.Path, org.apache.calcite.sql.validate.SqlValidatorScope.Resolved).

        指定者:
        getTable 在接口中 SqlValidatorCatalogReader
        参数:
        names - Name of table, may be qualified or fully-qualified
        返回:
        Table with the given name, or null
